summary: DRIVING APPROX 30-45 MILES PER HOUR.  WHILE CAR WAS IN MOTION ALL THE DASHBOARD LIGHTS (ALL THE WARNING LIGHTS) FLASHED ON AND THEN WENT OFF AND THEN THE FUEL LEVEL WENT TO ZERO AND THE LOW FUEL LEVEL LIGHT REMAINED ON. PUT THE CAR IN PARK, TURNED CAR OFF THEN TURNED THE CAR ON AND EVERYTHING APPEARED TO BE WORKING AS NORMAL.  INCIDENT OCCURRED 2 TIMES IN 3 MTHS.  1ST TIME POWER STEERING WENT OUT AND BREAK WAS DIFFICULT TO PUSH DOWN.  CONTACTED CHRYSLER AND OPENED CASE.  DEALERSHIP CANNOT REPLICATE THE PROBLEM ? SUGGEST I REMOVE THE KEY CHAINS.  CALL BACK IF I EXPERIENCE THE PROBLEM AGAIN.  *TR
